title: Why communicate a focus?
answer: So that my intent is clear and the why behind my actions is transparent. It is also a motivating pull to be useful and contribute to something beyond myself.

title: Why solutions for the all-electric economy?
answer: It solves all of the problems associated with a fossil fuel based economy and opens up new opportunities for growth.

title: Why sustainable economic growth?
answer: Its the only viable solution to tackle a host of issues we are currently facing.

title: Why clean renewable energy?
answer: Fixes our polluted air, removes the issues with energy insecurity and contributes to reduced carbon emissions.

title: Why technological innovation?
answer: We need to do more with less to drive economic growth. Its the only effective tool we have left.
